Bundles > General > src/test/resources

The pom files of skysail bundles usually have a similar layout the main sections of which are described here in more detail:

The parent pom:

exam.properties 

### what is this file for? see AbstractFrameworkIntegrationSetup or http://team.ops4j.org/wiki/display/paxexam/Configuration
pax.exam.system=default

The parent pom:

logback-test.xml 

<configuration scan="true">
  <appender name="STDOUT" class="ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender">
    <filter class="ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter">
      <level>WARN</level>
    </filter>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>test> %d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%thread] %-5level %logger{36} -
         %msg%n
      </pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="FILE" class="ch.qos.logback.core.FileAppender">
    <filter class="ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter">
      <level>DEBUG</level>
    </filter>
    <file>etc/testrun.log</file>
      <append>false</append>
      <encoder>
        <pattern>%-5level %logger{55} - %msg%n
        </pattern>
      </encoder>
  </appender>

  <root level="DEBUG">
      <appender-ref ref="STDOUT" />
      <appender-ref ref="FILE" />
  </root>
</configuration>
